entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 30 except minus 22 in a few localities. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 30 except minus 22 in a few localities. Wind chill minus 26 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 8:28 PM MST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow. High minus 16.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the morning then periods of snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 36 in the morning and minus 20 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 8:28 PM MST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending overnight then partly cloudy. Local amount 2 cm over northern sections. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 20 in the evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 8:28 PM MST Tuesday 14 February 2023
